text:
When I try to start the apache.exe in Oracle 9i, as the HTTP SERVER, I get this 
message: CAN'T FIND CWD.PM...

Somebody know how to solve this?
creator: the_kerberos@hotmail.com

text:
I am sorry, but we have no way to know what changes Oracle
has made to the version of Apache they distribute.  That
is not a standard apache error message.

Please contact Oracle for support or install Apache from
http://httpd.apache.org/ if you don't need the features
Oracle provides.
creator: slive@apache.org
